item.title: Program
item.description:
Symposium Program

Stay on top of every session with the confirmed schedule below. Additional days and afternoon sessions will be added once finalized.

Registration

  • July 10, 14:00â€“21:00: On-site registration opens in the venue lobby.

July 11, 2025 Â· Morning Sessions

Time Session Chair
9:00â€“9:30 Opening Ceremony
â€¢ Speeches from Vice-Presidents
â€¢ Group Photo		 Chair: Wei Xu
9:30â€“10:10 Invited Talk: Linear Genetic Programming
Speaker: Prof. Wolfgang Banzhaf		 Chair: Jing Liang
10:10â€“10:30 Tea Break Chair: â€”
10:30â€“11:10 Invited Talk: Revisiting Evolutionary Machine Learning â€“ 50 Years of Development
Speaker: Prof. Mengjie Zhang		 Chair: Liang Feng
11:10â€“11:50 Invited Talk: Co-Evolutionary Approach to Program and Test Case Generation with Large Language Models
Speaker: Prof. Yuan Yuan		 Chair: â€”
11:50â€“12:20 Panel Discussion: What are the unique advantages of GPEML? What are the biggest bottlenecks in GPEML development and real-world adoption, and how to overcome them?
Panelists: Prof. Mengjie Zhang, Prof. Wolfgang Banzhaf, Prof. Chao Qian, Prof. Yuan Yuan, Prof. Yanan Sun		 Chair: Bing Xue

item.title: Registration
item.description:
Registration

The registration system is now open for both the author(s) and general participants:

Click here to register (Link to be updated)

You will be provided information on how to get the Invitation Letter in the registration confirmation email. For visa information, please refer to the Visa Information Guide.

Registration Fee

Please note:

  • The USD amounts are for indication purposes only. Your actual registration fee will be charged in Chinese Yuan (CNY). The registration fee must be paid in Chinese Yuan (CNY).
  • Student registrants must send a letter from their University/Institution confirming their studentship to registration@gpeml2025.org.
  • At least one author per accepted paper must register for the symposium and present their paper. A single full registration (general) covers one paper. A full registration (student) can be used to cover a paper only if the student is the first author and will be presenting the paper at the symposium.
  • All accepted papers must be registered by 15 June 2025.
  • Cancellations received by 1 July 2025 are eligible for a full refund, minus a Â¥100 administration fee. No refunds (partial or full) will be given for cancellations made after July 1, 2025. All cancellation requests must be submitted via email to registration@gpeml2025.org.

Early Registration (by 1 June 2025)

Registration Type General (CNY) Students (CNY)
Full Registration 2500 (â‰ˆ 350 USD) 1800 (â‰ˆ 252 USD)
Daily registration (July 11 or 12) 1200 (â‰ˆ 168 USD) 1200 (â‰ˆ 168 USD)
Option: Additional Paper (Per paper) 1200 (â‰ˆ 168 USD) 1200 (â‰ˆ 168 USD)
Option: Additional Page Charge (Per Page) 400 (â‰ˆ 56 USD) 400 (â‰ˆ 56 USD)
Additional Dinner Ticket 300 (â‰ˆ 42 USD) 300 (â‰ˆ 42 USD)

Late Registration (2 June 2025 ~ 5 July 2025)

Registration Type General (CNY) Students (CNY)
Full Registration 3000 (â‰ˆ 420 USD) 2200 (â‰ˆ 308 USD)
Daily registration (July 11 or 12) 1400 (â‰ˆ 196 USD) 1400 (â‰ˆ 196 USD)
Additional Dinner Ticket 300 (â‰ˆ 42 USD) 300 (â‰ˆ 42 USD)

Onsite Registration (10 July 2025 ~ 12 July 2025)

Registration Type General (CNY) Students (CNY)
Full Registration 3500 (â‰ˆ 490 USD) 2600 (â‰ˆ 364 USD)
Daily registration (July 11 or 12) 1600 (â‰ˆ 224 USD) 1600 (â‰ˆ 224 USD)
Additional Dinner Ticket 300 (â‰ˆ 42 USD) 300 (â‰ˆ 42 USD)

Symposium Registration Inclusions

Full Registration - General and Student, includes:

  • A symposium bag with gifts.
  • Access to all sessions in the GPEML 2025 symposium.
  • Morning tea, lunch, afternoon tea across all symposium days.
  • Symposium reception on July 10, 2025.
  • Symposium dinner on July 11, 2025.

Daily registration includes:

  • A symposium bag with gifts.
  • Access to all sessions on the day registered, excluding symposium reception and symposium dinner.
  • Morning tea, lunch, afternoon tea on the day registered.

Payment Methods

  • Credit Card (Visa, MasterCard, UnionPay)
  • Bank Transfer
  • Alipay / WeChat Pay

Author Registration

At least one author of each accepted paper must register for the symposium by the camera-ready deadline (June 15, 2025) for the paper to be included in the proceedings.

item.title: Accommodations with Discount
item.description:
We have secured discounted room blocks at hotels within walking distance of the workshop venue. Early booking is strongly recommended; booking codes are required to claim the negotiated rates.

Huazhi Hotel (Symposium Venue)

  • Business King Room (single occupancy, 1 breakfast): Â¥350 per night
  • Business Twin Room (double occupancy, 2 breakfasts): Â¥380 per night
  • Sales Manager: Li Guangxi
  • Contact: +86 156 1791 2750

To guarantee the discounted rate, contact the sales manager directly and mention you are attending GPEML 2025.

item.title: Meeting Rooms and Floor Plans
item.description:
Detailed floor plans and room assignments will be published alongside the final programme. Onsite signage and the event app will mirror the information provided here to help you navigate the venue efficiently.

Planned Resources

  • Downloadable PDF map showing plenary, breakout, and poster spaces
  • Accessibility paths and elevator locations
  • Registration desk hours and help-desk locations

Please revisit this page closer to the workshop for the latest layouts.

item.title: Symposium Venue
item.description:
Date & Venue

  • Time: July 10â€“12, 2025
  • Venue: Huazhi Hotel, Zhengzhou
    • No. 97, Kexue Avenue, Zhongyuan District, Zhengzhou (intersection of Kexue Avenue and Changchun Road)

The Huazhi Hotel offers modern plenary halls, flexible breakout rooms, high-speed Wi-Fi, and seamless catering service for coffee breaks and lunches. Accessibility services are available upon request. Additional logistics and onsite tips will be added as the event approaches.

item.title: Submission
item.description:
Paper Submission

All paper submissions must be made through the symposium submission system.

Submission System

Submit your paper here (Link to be updated)

Submission Guidelines

Format Requirements

  • Format: Springer LNCS (Lecture Notes in Computer Science) format
  • Page Limit: Maximum 12 pages (including references)
  • File Format: PDF only
  • Language: English

Paper Categories

  1. Regular Papers - Full research papers (12 pages)
  2. Short Papers - Work-in-progress or position papers (6 pages)

Review Process

  • All papers will undergo a double-blind review process
  • Each paper will be reviewed by at least three program committee members
  • Reviews will be based on originality, technical quality, significance, and clarity

Important Dates

  • Paper Submission Deadline: June 13, 2025
  • Extended Paper Submission Deadline: June 27, 2025 (Anywhere on Earth)
  • Acceptance Notification: August 22, 2025
  • Camera-Ready Submission: September 5, 2025

Submission Checklist

Before submitting, please ensure:

item.title: Calls
item.description:
Calls

This section contains all the calls for participation in GPEML.

Call for Papers

The Program Committee invites original, substantial, and unpublished technical papers on all areas of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

Deadline: June 13, 2025 (Extended: June 27, 2025)

Call for Workshops

We invite proposals for workshops to be held in conjunction with GPEML.

Deadline: April 22, 2025

Call for Sponsorship

We welcome sponsorship from organizations interested in supporting GPEML.

item.title: Committee
item.description:
Steering Committee

Wolfgang Banzhaf

Michigan State University, USA

Mengjie Zhang

Victoria University of Wellington, New Zealand

Bing Xue

Victoria University of Wellington, New Zealand

Ying Bi

Zhengzhou University, China

Chao Qian

Nanjing University, China

Jinghui Zhong

South China University of Technology, China

Yanan Sun

Sichuan University, China

Cuie Yang

Northeast University, China

Liang Feng

Chongqing University, China

Workshop Organisation

Time

To achieve the main goals of the workshop, the preferred timeframe is Julyâ€“September each year.

item.title: Future GPEML Symposia
item.description:
We are pleased to announce that:

  • GPEML 2026, the 2nd edition, is currently being organized. Please visit GPEML-2026 overview for updates.

item.title: Past GPEML Symposia
item.description:
GPEML 2025 Â· Zhengzhou, China

  • Dates: July 10â€“12, 2025
  • Venue: Huazhi Hotel, Zhengzhou
  • Materials: Proceedings, photos, and committee contacts are available on the event microsite.
  • Learn more: Visit the GPEML 2025 website
